attributes.action: consider awarding Scottish football legend Dave Mackay an honour in the 2007 Christmas list for services to Association Football.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a player:

1953–1972 Heart of Midlothian, Tottenham Hotspur, Derby County, Swindon Town    

1957–1965 Scotland 22 caps 

As a manager: 
1971-1991 Swindon Town, Nottingham Forest, Derby County, Walsall, Kuwait, Doncaster Rovers, Birmingham City.

An inaugural inductee of the English Football Hall of Fame in 2002.

A real Legend!
